title: Sonic the Hedgehog (film)
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog[lower-alpha 2] is a 2020 adventure comedy film directed by Jeff Fowler (in his feature directorial debut) and written by Pat Casey and Josh Miller based on the video game franchise of the same name created by Sega. It stars James Marsden, Ben Schwartz, Tika Sumpter, Natasha Rothwell, Adam Pally, Neal McDonough, and Jim Carrey. It is the first installment in a planned Sonic the Hedgehog film series. The film follows Sonic the Hedgehog (voiced by Schwartz), a hedgehog who can run supersonic speeds, teams up with local town sheriff Tom Wachowski (Marsden), to stop the evil mad scientist Dr. Robotnik (Carrey), who seeks to use Sonic's superpowers to conquer the world.
